response.overview: A DEA agent and an undercover Naval Intelligence officer who have been tasked with investigating one another find they have been set up by the mob -- the very organization the two men believe they have been stealing money from.
response.tagline: Never rob a bank across from a diner with the best donuts in three counties.
response.title: 2 Guns

results.name: 2 GUNS Interviews: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton and Bill Paxton
